en.HELP_MESSAGE: You can say tell me a Cool India Facts, or, you can say exit... What can I help you with?
en.HELP_REPROMPT: What can I help you with?
en.FALLBACK_MESSAGE: The Cool India Facts skill can't help you with that.  It can help you discover facts about India if you say tell me a Cool India Facts. What can I help you with?
en.FALLBACK_REPROMPT: What can I help you with?
FACTS: India has A floating post office.
India has The highest cricket ground in the world.
The Indian national Kabaddi team has won all World Cups.
Water on the moon was discovered by India.
Science day in Switzerland is dedicated to Ex-Indian President, APJ Abdul Kalam.
India has The first country to consume sugar
